entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Quispamsis
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023
